channel.title: Authenticity on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Authenticity on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: day #94
item.description: coming out from under a dark cloud. my passion has been tested & refined during the past few months, and i’m happy to say that i’m starting to see it again. and this time, it’s version 2.0! i’ve come to recognize that my core values & strengths were not aligned with my behavior. my energy was being diffused by activities & investments that were incongruent.
